trans-unit.source: Machine Learning example app: Frequently Bought Together | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning example app: Frequently Bought Together | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A Machine Learning web service that performs online shopping cart analysis to produce product recommendations of items frequently bought together from historical transactions provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: A Machine Learning web service that performs online shopping cart analysis to produce product recommendations of items frequently bought together from historical transactions provided by the user.

trans-unit.source: Machine Learning example app: Frequently Bought Together
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning example app: Frequently Bought Together

trans-unit.source: IMPORTANT: THIS SERVICE HAS BEEN DEPRECATED
trans-unit.target: IMPORTANT: THIS SERVICE HAS BEEN DEPRECATED

trans-unit.source: The Frequently Bought Together functionality that this service provides has now been integrated into our more broad [Recommendations API] (http://gallery.azureml.net/MachineLearningAPI/3574432384684cac9cc766e57729ea4c).
trans-unit.target: The Frequently Bought Together functionality that this service provides has now been integrated into our more broad [Recommendations API] (http://gallery.azureml.net/MachineLearningAPI/3574432384684cac9cc766e57729ea4c).

trans-unit.source: We encourage you to use Recommendations instead of this service.
trans-unit.target: We encourage you to use Recommendations instead of this service.

trans-unit.source: The <link><linkText>Frequently Bought Together web service</linkText><title></title></link> in Machine Learning performs online shopping cart analysis to produce product recommendations of items frequently bought together from historical transactions.
trans-unit.target: The <link><linkText>Frequently Bought Together web service</linkText><title></title></link> in Machine Learning performs online shopping cart analysis to produce product recommendations of items frequently bought together from historical transactions.

trans-unit.source: Frequently Bought Together recommendations help shoppers identify products in a catalog that are most relevant when purchasing a specific item.
trans-unit.target: Frequently Bought Together recommendations help shoppers identify products in a catalog that are most relevant when purchasing a specific item.

trans-unit.source: Prominently showing these recommendations has proven effective in improving sales for online retailers.
trans-unit.target: Prominently showing these recommendations has proven effective in improving sales for online retailers.

trans-unit.source: After you have subscribed to the Frequently Bought Together web service, you can use the <link><linkText>Market Basket Analysis Service example web application</linkText><title></title></link> to easily upload your data into a model and discover frequently bought product sets.
trans-unit.target: After you have subscribed to the Frequently Bought Together web service, you can use the <link><linkText>Market Basket Analysis Service example web application</linkText><title></title></link> to easily upload your data into a model and discover frequently bought product sets.

trans-unit.source: To use use the application or API, you first need your API key, which you can get from the <link><linkText>Azure Data Market Account Page</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To use use the application or API, you first need your API key, which you can get from the <link><linkText>Azure Data Market Account Page</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: This service contains APIs to create Frequently Bought Together models, upload historical transactions, and retrieve the best-ranked, frequently bought together product set for a given product.
trans-unit.target: This service contains APIs to create Frequently Bought Together models, upload historical transactions, and retrieve the best-ranked, frequently bought together product set for a given product.

trans-unit.source: Examples that demonstrate how to use these APIs can be found on the <link><linkText>Azure-MachineLearning-DataScience</linkText><title></title></link> repository on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: Examples that demonstrate how to use these APIs can be found on the <link><linkText>Azure-MachineLearning-DataScience</linkText><title></title></link> repository on GitHub.
